LanguageData.JRWCoahuilaceratops.label: Coahuilaceratops
LanguageData.JRWCoahuilaceratops.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #09383-2010 [COAHUILACERATOPS MAGNACUERNA] CODENAME: MARIGOLD >70
A bulky chasmosaurine ceratopsian that has integrated well into the harsh life on the rim. The markings on their frill have proven effective at scaring predators away.
LanguageData.JRWCoahuilaceratops.tools.horn-0.label: horn
LanguageData.JRWCoahuilaceratops.tools.horn-1.label: horn
LanguageData.JRWCoahuilaceratops.tools.head.label: head
